item.title: EP 166 - The Tale Of The Talking Tumor
item.itunes:title: The Tale Of The Talking Tumor
item.description:
Today we take a look at a mass delusion that almost started a war, and then we discuss the tale of the talking tumor!

 

In 1983, women and young girls began fainting in the West Bank. Was it a chemical weapon attack, a simple gas leak, or a mass delusion that almost forced the Palestians and the Israelis to go war?

 

And then we examine the story of a woman who began hearing voices in her head. The voices were telling her to go to the hospital. And when she did, the story only gets stranger!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

"Jason's Apartment" By Ian

https://imgur.com/a/nfrp8uZ

 

1983 West Bank fainting epidemic

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983_West_Bank_fainting_epidemic

 

Transcript of 1983 West Bank fainting epidemic

https://prezi.com/nx2kmyahhrxw/1983-west-bank-fainting-epidemic/

 

Epidemic of Acute Illness--West Bank

https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00000068.htm

1983 West Bank fainting epidemic

https://factrepublic.com/facts/18355/

 

A difficult case: Diagnosis made by hallucinatory voices

https://southwestpsych.wordpress.com/2011/04/26/paranormal/amp/

 

Bicameralism

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicameralism_(psychology)

 

The Bicameral Mind and Our Constant Inner Monologue

https://medium.com/understanding-us/the-bicameral-mind-and-our-constant-inner-monologue-caf57db770a6

 

Overview of Julian Jaynes's Theory

http://www.julianjaynes.org/julian-jaynes-theory-overview.php

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
